pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, November 14, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Monday, November 14, 2016:

Toronto, Ontario

10:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in an infrastructure roundtable with the Minister of Finance, Bill Morneau, the Minister of Infrastructure and Communities, Amarjeet Sohi, the Minister of Transport, Marc Garneau, and the Minister of Natural Resources, James Carr.

The Gallery
Ritz-Carlton Toronto
Toronto, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the end of the meeting
  • Media should arrive no later than 11:00 a.m. and should present themselves at the 4th floor boardroom


2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Long Term Investor Summit with the Minister of Finance, Bill Morneau, the Minister of International Trade, Chrystia Freeland, the Minister of Natural Resources, James Carr, the Minister of Environment and Climate Change, Catherine McKenna, the Minister of Innovation, Science and Economic Development, Navdeep Bains, the Minister of Health, Jane Philpott, the Minister of Canadian Heritage, MÃ©lanie Joly, the Minister of Infrastructure and Communities, Amarjeet Sohi, and the Minister of Transport, Marc Garneau.

Closed to media.

4:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Rosedale Room
Shangri-La Hotel
Toronto, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 4:00 p.m. and should present themselves at the 3rd floor screening room


PMO Media Relations:
media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
